scripts.prepare:thena: mustache config/thena.json subgraph.solidly.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml; mustache config/thena.json config/config.template.ts > config/config.ts
scripts.prepare:chronos: mustache config/chronos.json subgraph.solidly.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml; mustache config/chronos.json config/config.template.ts > config/config.ts
scripts.prepare:ramses: mustache config/ramses.json subgraph.solidly.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml; mustache config/ramses.json config/config.template.ts > config/config.ts
scripts.prepare:based: mustache config/based.json subgraph.based.yaml > subgraph.yaml; mustache config/based.json config/config.symm.ts > config/config.ts
